recipesJson.name: Pearingue Pie
recipesJson.author: JustinVaping
recipesJson.description: Is it Lemon? Is it Pear? Is it Pie? Who the hell knows for sure???. Lemon Sicily FA and Lemon Meringue Pie CAP join forces to make Lemon nirvana , Pear FA makes this mix more complex and adds a bit of reality , Whipped Cream FA and Meringue FA combine to make a creamy vanilla meringue topping mmmmmmm , if that wasn't enough we add Hazelnut FW and Biscuit JF for crust , Super Sweet is not needed but can be used very low.
